snippets.text: Filipino comfort should feel tangy-savory, family-table friendly, and rice-anchored.
Weeknight Filipino profile can simplify to adobo skillet or quick noodle-pan style.
Filipino cues include adobo balance, sinigang sour broth, and garlic-forward aromatics.
